A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Horrible\, horrible movie. Worst SW movie EVER. New characters are boring and have not been built up enough to invest any feelings into them. Worst part of all\, was the total slap in the face of Luke Skywalker. Rian Johnson and Kathleen Kennedy really took a piss on this beloved franchise.
